text.headline: Project Phases and Timeline
text.text: This project is divided into four phases. Each phase listed includes detailed steps the implementation. Action items for faculty, students, and staff are included. This timeline and information are updated frequently as the project progresses.

media.caption: This timeline describes the software project plan for a implementation of a branded scalable Mbarara University Learning Management System.

text.headline: Phase One - Conceptualization (ongoing)
text.text: The objective of the project is to provide an implementation for excellent and scalable modern, powerful LMS -easy to use, easy to manage MOOC platform

media.caption: This timeline describes the software project plan for a implementation of a branded scalable Mbarara University Learning Management System.

text.text: This contains the procedure to be followed if the need arises to modify the SRS once the requirements have been signed-off

text.headline: Phase Three - Full Implementation
text.text: Creating a MUST Online Learning Center with more advanced features for modern learning Institutions
